Notes : 
1.  Uncertainties given at the one s level.     2.  f206 % denotes the percentage of 
206Pb that is common Pb. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
3.  Correction for common Pb made using the measured 
204Pb/
206Pb ratio.     4.  For % Conc., 100% denotes a concordant analysis.
